popularDishesText: Below are the currently most frequently ordered items from the 2023 season menu
breakfastText: A well-prepared and neatly presented foundation every day does not have to be complicated. According to opinions, it was breakfast that earned us a place on the podium in Tricity.
sandwichBaguetteText: French classics at their best, i.e. freshly baked baguettes every day in a selected version.
croquesText: French classics at their best, i.e. freshly baked baguettes every day in a selected version.
appetizersText: Try popular items in their original version or French delicacies that you can't find anywhere else, because who wouldn't be tempted by real onion soup or homemade foie gras?!
mainDishesText: Unusual French-style compositions. Complete dishes that will satisfy adventure-hungry adventurers.
galettesText: Breton style in its purest form, gluten-free buckwheat pancakes served in a way not available anywhere else in the Tricity. There is only one original - Galette Complète, but here it is available for the whole family. Choose the galette according to your favorite ingredients.
crepesText: A sweet fantasy known to everyone since childhood. They say those at A la Francaise taste best at any time of the day. Our homemade Nutella and homemade salted caramel often make it easier to make this decision. The classic in this category remains the legendary, steeped in France - Crêpe Suzette.
dessertsText: The real moments of happiness are the chocolate flowing from Fondant, combining with vanilla ice cream. But regardless of your choice, each of our desserts will take you straight to paradise.

contact.firstText: We invite you to make online reservations and organize special events. We also encourage you to use catering.
contact.secondText: At the same time, we would like to point out that each submitted form must be confirmed by a return contact from the restaurant.
contact.description: I consent to the processing of my personal data by A La Francaise, in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act. More in

hero.subTitle: our offer
hero.title: Tasting sets of original French cheeses
hero.text: You can order French cheese boards along with other snacks and special catering from us.⬇️ONLINE SHOP⬇️

about.firstText: We have a wide range of breakfasts, lunches and dinners in the spirit of original French cuisine, and our meals are complemented by great wines.
about.secondText: All culinary specialties in A la francaise are the work of Dominique, a chef from Brittany. Since childhood, he dreamed of cooking and baking for others. He learned his profession at the culinary school in Dinard, where in 1997 he received a BTS diploma. Before settling in Gdańsk, he honed his talent in restaurants in England, Ireland and his native Brittany.
about.thirdText: The co-owner of the restaurant is Joanna, from Masuria. After graduating from the Hotel Technical Secondary School in Mrągowo, she continued her education at the Jagiellonian University in Krakow, graduating with a master's degree in Tourism Management. She learned the art of waiting in restaurants in Masuria, Krakow and France.

seasonOffer.subText: An informal meeting with friends over a Raclette? Or an elegant birthday party with a delicious Fraisier cake?
seasonOffer.text: It's up to you how and what you celebrate with us, and it's up to us to provide you with delicious taste experiences, in a Breton atmosphere and a pleasant atmosphere. A home evening with a board of French cheeses and cold cuts or full catering on the occasion... or without occasions, with personal collection or delivery in the Tricity. There are many occasions for feasting, and their arrangement only with A la Francaise.

newsletter.text: Subscribe and stay up to date with our offer and promotions!
newsletter.description: By subscribing to the newsletter, you consent to the processing of your personal data by A la française and accept

store.description: The highest quality products imported from France, manufactured according to strictly guarded recipes. AOC certification guarantees the original, full taste of each type of cheese sold. They taste best with our homemade jam, honey, grapes and nuts.
